summary: Crypto is creating the next batch of unhinged Netflix crime series
title: Modern Grifters and The Golden Age of Fraud
detailed_content: We’ve all been watching the absurd antics of Hollywood’s newest self-reflective obsession, the Modern Grifter series like The Dropout, WeCrashed, Inventing Anna, and a host of other shows hold up a mirror to America’s worst capitalist excesses. While there certainly is a bit of…
author: Stephen Diehl
